The #DixieFire continues to grow and is now over 510k acres & only 30% contained. So far over 1,100 structures have been destroyed. For the first time in recorded history, wildfire smokes have reached the North Pole. The smoke has wafted for over 1800 miles from hundreds of wildfires that originated in Russia and has now reached the North Pole. #wildfire #North #Russia
